#########################################################################
model{
	C <- 100000
	# Truco de los ceros
	for (i in 1:N){
		zY[i] <- 0
		zY[i] ~ dpois(phi[i])
		fY[i] <- (alphaY / sY) * pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY - 1) * exp(-pow(y[i]/sY , -alphaY))
		phi[i] <- -log(fY[i]) + C
	}
	# Aprioris PM10
	alphaY ~  dunif(0,10)
	sY ~ dunif(0,350)
}

data
list(y=c(481, 407, 428, 541, 560, 404, 455, 338, 650, 450, 631, 585, 988, 998, 749, 914, 561, 709, 584, 291, 278, 707, 612, 737, 570, 809, 1038, 480, 383, 959, 733, 894, 363, 486, 965, 774, 708, 816, 822, 879, 991, 941, 817, 524, 394, 930, 702, 594, 982, 564, 609, 701, 399, 455, 459, 242, 226, 360, 798, 336, 334, 592, 809, 257, 998, 437, 288, 211, 221, 341, 395, 543, 536, 602, 804, 662, 449, 354, 171, 308, 225, 361, 359, 369, 659, 472, 450, 407, 602, 436, 220, 263, 265, 330, 324, 894, 866, 936, 485, 431, 539, 469, 345, 310, 302, 342, 486, 735, 578, 319, 646, 508, 358, 528, 274, 399, 230, 323, 533, 661, 683, 521, 452, 523, 354, 377, 304, 199, 270, 277, 320, 561, 774, 506, 1570, 513, 250, 514, 291, 202, 196, 263, 290, 1020, 1304, 430, 448, 340, 282, 421, 219, 196, 219, 246, 264, 281, 1319, 564, 352, 439, 383, 342, 185, 209, 249, 378, 642, 405, 408, 876, 337, 377, 466, 360, 609, 429, 266, 389, 567, 574, 365, 524, 629, 419, 559, 334, 203, 326, 418, 589, 476, 501, 618, 452, 825, 1269, 477, 732, 208, 166, 187, 242, 496, 469, 915, 285, 433, 727, 434, 305, 424, 248, 425, 272, 223, 593, 830, 273, 496, 1023, 512, 211, 327, 190, 164, 210, 264, 378, 311, 699, 330, 358, 223, 159, 187, 136, 162, 187, 223, 247, 610, 335, 292, 426, 351, 397, 186, 152, 151, 180, 247, 742, 511, 807, 307, 278, 291, 208, 535, 172, 163, 189, 287, 703, 611, 329, 292, 425, 302, 243, 209, 185, 249, 218, 286, 694, 353, 271, 303, 294, 265, 195, 195, 124, 140, 248, 327, 414, 653, 327, 626, 299, 241, 178, 155, 162, 132, 138, 219, 359, 426, 289, 336, 615, 468, 261, 307, 140, 116, 247, 355, 333, 404, 382, 982, 564, 726, 271, 187, 83, 174, 131, 375, 401), N=324)
